Row.Text: Airport Upgrade
Amphitheater Upgrade
Arena Upgrade
Armory Upgrade
Bank Upgrade
Barracks Upgrade
Broadcast Center Upgrade
Medieval Walls Upgrade
Cathedral Upgrade
Dar-e Mehr Upgrade
Electronics Factory Upgrade
Factory Upgrade
Film Studio Upgrade
Granary Upgrade
Gurdwara Upgrade
Hangar Upgrade
Library Upgrade
Lighthouse Upgrade
Madrasa Upgrade
Market Upgrade
Meeting House Upgrade
Military Academy Upgrade
Monument Upgrade
Mosque Upgrade
Art Museum Upgrade
Archaeological Museum Upgrade
Pagoda Upgrade
Palace Upgrade
Power Plant Upgrade
Research Lab Upgrade
Seaport Upgrade
Sewer Upgrade
Shipyard Upgrade
Shrine Upgrade
Stable Upgrade
Stadium Upgrade
Renaissance Walls Upgrade
Stave Church Upgrade
Stock Exchange Upgrade
Stupa Upgrade
Synagogue Upgrade
Temple Upgrade
University Upgrade
Ancient Walls Upgrade
Wat Upgrade
Water Mill Upgrade
Workshop Upgrade
Zoo Upgrade
An upgraded Amphitheater is able to accommodate more spectators.
An upgraded Airport receives more visitors from around the world. All [ICON_Tourism] Tourism yields are increased +10%. Additional +1 air unit slot in Aerodrome district.

An upgraded Arena accommodates more viewers and hosts gladiator fights. [ICON_Resource_Coffee] Coffee, [ICON_Resource_Jade] Jade, [ICON_Resource_Marble] Marble and [ICON_Resource_Silk] Silk resources gain +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture each.
Our units are better equipped after an upgrade to the Armory. All land units trained in this city get +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.

Trade is booming in the city thanks to an upgraded Bank. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold; domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. [ICON_Resource_Diamonds] Diamonds, [ICON_Resource_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Resource_Silver] Silver resources gain +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold each.
An upgraded Barracks increase efficiency of Camps. +2 [ICON_Production] Production from Camps. May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.

An upgraded Broadcast Center can store more music and allows for 24/7 transmissions. Grants +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work of Music slot to the Broadcast Center and +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity to each city center within 6 tiles.
Further increases the strength of your outer defenses.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.

A building upgrade unique to Japan. Bonus +2 [ICON_Production] Production to all cities within 9 tiles. Additional +3 [ICON_Production] Production for each era since constructed or last repaired. After researching the Electricity technology this upgrade provides an additional +3 [ICON_Culture] Culture to its city.
Bonus +1 [ICON_Production] Production is extended to all cities within 6 tiles. Additional +2 [ICON_Production] Production for each era since constructed or last repaired.
A building upgrade unique to America. Grants +2 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work of Music slots to the Film Studio and +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities to each city center within 9 tiles.
An upgrade for Granary increases storage space. [ICON_Resource_Bananas] Bananas and [ICON_Resource_Wine] Wine resources gain +2 [ICON_Food] Food each.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.

An upgraded Hangar accomodates civilian planes and better equipment for air units. Additional +1 air unit slot in Aerodrome district and +2 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in this city. All air units trained in this city get +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.
An upgraded Library allows to store more clay plates, parchment scrolls, and books. Citizens are visiting it more often.
An upgraded Lighthouse allows Fishing Boats to sail further. Adds +1 [ICON_Food] to each Fishing Boats and Fishery in this city.
A building upgrade unique to Arabia. Recent renovation allows for the education of (horrors) women.

An upgraded Market hosts more traders and shopkeepers. [ICON_Resource_Citrus] Citrus, [ICON_Resource_Cocoa] Cocoa, [ICON_Resource_Spices] Spices, [ICON_Resource_Sugar] Sugar and [ICON_Resource_Tea] Tea resources gain +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold each.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.
An upgraded Military Academy includes campus for more students. All units trained in this city get double Flanking Bonus.

We can finally write down on the Monument the name of our magnificent leader - you! People rejoyce and it increases morale of our soldiers. Units trained in this city receive +2 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting Barbarians.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.

An upgraded Art Museum hosts commercial exhibits. +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each non-religious [ICON_GreatWork_Writing][ICON_GreatWork_Artifact][ICON_GreatWork_Portrait][ICON_GreatWork_Landscape][ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture][ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work in the City.

An upgraded Archaeological Museum hosts commercial exhibits. +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each non-religious [ICON_GreatWork_Writing][ICON_GreatWork_Artifact][ICON_GreatWork_Portrait][ICON_GreatWork_Landscape][ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture][ICON_GreatWork_Music] Great Work in the City.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.
The improved Palace is finally worthy of its main resident - you!

An upgraded Power Plant is a true regional industry hub. Bonus +2 [ICON_Production] Production extends to each city center within 9 tiles. Additional +2 [ICON_Production] Production for each specialty district constructed in this city. Adds +3 [ICON_Production] Production to each Oil Well in this city.

Bonus +2 [ICON_Science] Science extends to each city center within 9 tiles. Grants +2 [ICON_Science] Science to [ICON_Resource_Oil] Oil, +3 [ICON_Science] Science to [ICON_Resource_Aluminum] Aluminum and [ICON_Resource_Copper] Copper and +4 [ICON_Science] Science to [ICON_Resource_Uranium] Uranium.

Recent upgrades in Seaport infrastructure increased its capacity allowing the City to grow. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. Bonus [ICON_Production] Production equal to the adjacency bonus of the Harbor district. +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each Fishing Boats and Fishery. Adds +3 [ICON_Production] Production to each Offshore Oil Rig in this city.
An upgraded Sewer serves more citizens.
A renovated Shrine has attracted additional followers from distant corners of the empire.
An upgraded Stable increases efficiency of Pastures. +2 [ICON_Production] Production from Pastures. May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Barracks.

An upgraded Shipyard allows for future enhancements and better equipment for naval units. Additional +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each era since constructed or last repaired. All naval units trained in this city get +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.
All [ICON_Tourism] Tourism yields are increased +10%. Bonus +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 9 tiles.
It seems that your engineers outperformed themsels. This upgrade increases the strength of your outer defenses to the (really) highest possible level.

A building upgrade unique to Norway. +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith from Lumber Mills. The Stave Church can now hold an additional +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic. [ICON_Resource_Dyes] Dyes, [ICON_Resource_Incense] Incense, and [ICON_Resource_Tobacco] Tobacco resources gain +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith each.

An upgraded Stock Exchange is a true regional business hub. Bonus +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold extends to each city center within 9 tiles. Additional +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each specialty district constructed in this city.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.

A renovation of the Temple is most welcomed by our religious community. The Temple can now hold an additional +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic. [ICON_Resource_Dyes] Dyes, [ICON_Resource_Incense] Incense, and [ICON_Resource_Tobacco] Tobacco resources gain +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith each.
An upgraded University allows for researching non-technical sciences.
Increases the strength of your Walls by half.

An upgraded Water Mill can also be used for a finishing process on woollen cloth. [ICON_Resource_Sheep] Sheep, [ICON_Resource_Furs] Furs and [ICON_Resource_Cotton] Cotton resources gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production each. City must be adjacent to a River.
A renovation of this place of worship is most welcomed by our religious community.
An upgraded Workshop increases efficiency of nearby operations. +1 [ICON_Production] Production from Lumber Mills, Quarries and Mines with resources.
An upgraded Zoo exhibits new animal species. +4 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in this city.
Tlachtli Upgrade

A building upgrade unique to the Aztecs. [ICON_Resource_Coffee] Coffee, [ICON_Resource_Jade] Jade, [ICON_Resource_Marble] Marble and [ICON_Resource_Silk] Silk resources gain +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture each.
Sukiennice Upgrade

A building upgrade unique to Poland. Grants an additional +1 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant point per turn. [ICON_Resource_Citrus] Citrus, [ICON_Resource_Cocoa] Cocoa, [ICON_Resource_Spices] Spices, [ICON_Resource_Sugar] Sugar and [ICON_Resource_Tea] Tea resources gain +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold each.
Basilikoi Paides Upgrade

A building upgrade unique to Macedon. +2 [ICON_Production] Production from Camps. Grants additional +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point per turn. May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.
Prasat Upgrade

A building upgrade unique to Khmer. +3 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism. The Prasat can now hold an additional +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic. [ICON_Resource_Dyes] Dyes, [ICON_Resource_Incense] Incense, and [ICON_Resource_Tobacco] Tobacco resources gain +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith each.
Upgraded Armory
Land units +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.
Upgraded Shipyard
Naval units +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.
Upgraded Hangar
Air units +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.
